title: Episode 218: What's So Funny about Tribalism? Feat. Andrew Heaton
itunes:title: Episode 218: What's So Funny about Tribalism? Feat. Andrew Heaton
description:
This week, comedian and political commentator Andrew Heaton joins us to talk about his forthcoming book on Tribalism.
